description: Try our easy to follow Mango, Yoghurt & Coconut Meringue Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Vegetarian,Mango,Peanut free
name: Mango, Yoghurt & Coconut Meringue Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 160°C. Grease 2 x 22cm springform pans and line bases and sides with baking paper.
Beat butter and cup sugar in a large bowl of a stand mixer until pale and fluffy.

Add one egg at a time, beating well between each until combined. Sift flours and baking powder together in a separate bowl and stir into butter mixture with 1 cup yoghurt. Fold in coconut. Divide batter evenly between pans.

Place egg whites in a large, clean bowl of a stand mixer and beat until soft peaks form. Gradually add remaining sugar, 1 tbs at a time, beating until thick and glossy and sugar has completely dissolved. Spread mixture evenly over batter in pans, lightly swirling with the back of a spoon to cover surface. Bake for 40 minutes or until meringue is dry and pale golden. Turn off oven and leave cakes to cool in the oven with the door ajar for 1-2 hours or overnight.
Meanwhile, cut cheeks from both mangoes. Use a large spoon to scoop out flesh in one piece. Process half in a food processor until smooth. Swirl mango purée through remaining yoghurt.

Dollop half the mango yoghurt evenly over meringue on one cake. Carefully top with second cake, meringue side up, and spread with remaining mango yoghurt. To serve, slice remaining mango and arrange on top of cake.
